36 // List of topics to cancel goals, when the motors are stopped
37 static const char* ACTION_CANCEL_TOPICS[] = {"/niryo_robot_arm_commander/robot_action/cancel",
38  "/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/execute_program/cancel",
39  "/niryo_robot_tools_commander/action_server/cancel"};

46 HardwareInterface::HardwareInterface(ros::NodeHandle &nh) : _nh(nh)
47 {
48  /*for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
49  {
50  ros::Duration(1).sleep();
51  ROS_WARN("sleeping for %d", i);
52  }*/
53  init(nh);
54 }
55 
61 bool HardwareInterface::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
62 {
63  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::init - Initializing parameters...");
64  initParameters(nh);
65 
66  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::init - Init Nodes...");
67  initNodes(nh);
68 
69  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::init - Starting services...");
70  startServices(nh);
71 
72  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::init - Starting publishers...");
73  startPublishers(nh);
74 
75  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::init - Starting subscribers...");
76  startSubscribers(nh);
77 
78  return true;
79 }
80 
85 void HardwareInterface::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
86 {
87  double hw_status_frequency{1.0};
88  double sw_version_frequency{1.0};
89  nh.getParam("publish_hw_status_frequency", hw_status_frequency);
90  nh.getParam("publish_software_version_frequency", sw_version_frequency);
91 
92  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - publish_hw_status_frequency : %f", hw_status_frequency);
93  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - publish_software_version_frequency : %f", sw_version_frequency);
94 
95  assert(hw_status_frequency);
96  assert(sw_version_frequency);
97 
98  _hw_status_publisher_duration = ros::Duration(1.0 / hw_status_frequency);
99  _sw_version_publisher_duration = ros::Duration(1.0 / sw_version_frequency);
100 
101  nh.getParam("/niryo_robot/info/image_version", _rpi_image_version);
102  nh.getParam("/niryo_robot/info/ros_version", _ros_niryo_robot_version);
103  nh.getParam("hardware_version", _hardware_version);
104 
105  nh.getParam("gazebo", _gazebo);
106 
107  nh.getParam("can_enabled", _can_enabled);
108  nh.getParam("ttl_enabled", _ttl_enabled);
109 
110  _rpi_image_version.erase(_rpi_image_version.find_last_not_of(" \n\r\t") + 1);
111  _ros_niryo_robot_version.erase(_ros_niryo_robot_version.find_last_not_of(" \n\r\t") + 1);
112 
113  std::string conveyor_bus_str = "can";
114  nh.getParam("conveyor/bus", conveyor_bus_str);
115  if ("can" == conveyor_bus_str)
116  _conveyor_bus = EBusProtocol::CAN;
117  else if ("ttl" == conveyor_bus_str)
118  _conveyor_bus = EBusProtocol::TTL;
119  else
120  _conveyor_bus = EBusProtocol::UNKNOWN;
121 
122  // end effector is enabled if an id is defined
123  _end_effector_enabled = nh.hasParam("end_effector_interface/end_effector_id");
124 
125  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - image_version : %s", _rpi_image_version.c_str());
126  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - ros_version : %s", _ros_niryo_robot_version.c_str());
127 
128  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - gazebo : %s", _gazebo ? "true" : "false");
129 
130  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - can_enabled : %s", _can_enabled ? "true" : "false");
131  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - ttl_enabled : %s", _ttl_enabled ? "true" : "false");
132  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initParameters - end_effector_enabled : %s", _end_effector_enabled ? "true" : "false");
133 }
134 
139 void HardwareInterface::initNodes(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
140 {
141  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Init Nodes");
142 
143  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start CPU Interface Node");
144  ros::NodeHandle nh_cpu(nh, "cpu_interface");
145  _cpu_interface = std::make_shared<cpu_interface::CpuInterfaceCore>(nh_cpu);
146  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
147 
148  if (_ttl_enabled)
149  {
150  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start Dynamixel Driver Node");
151  ros::NodeHandle nh_ttl(nh, "ttl_driver");
152  _ttl_interface = std::make_shared<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore>(nh_ttl);
153  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
154 
155  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start Tools Interface Node");
156  ros::NodeHandle nh_tool(nh, "tools_interface");
157  _tools_interface = std::make_shared<tools_interface::ToolsInterfaceCore>(nh_tool, _ttl_interface);
158  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
159 
160  if (_end_effector_enabled)
161  {
162  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start End Effector Interface Node");
163  ros::NodeHandle nh_ee(nh, "end_effector_interface");
164  _end_effector_interface = std::make_shared<end_effector_interface::EndEffectorInterfaceCore>(nh_ee, _ttl_interface);
165  }
166  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
167  }
168  else
169  {
170  ROS_WARN("HardwareInterface::initNodes - DXL communication is disabled for debug purposes");
171  }
172 
173  if (_can_enabled)
174  {
175  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start CAN Driver Node");
176  ros::NodeHandle nh_can(nh, "can_driver");
177  _can_interface = std::make_shared<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore>(nh_can);
178  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
179  }
180  else
181  {
182  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - CAN communication is disabled for debug purposes");
183  }
184 
185  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start Joints Interface Node");
186  ros::NodeHandle nh_joints(nh, "joints_interface");
187  _joints_interface = std::make_shared<joints_interface::JointsInterfaceCore>(nh, nh_joints, _ttl_interface, _can_interface);
188  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
189 
190  ROS_DEBUG("HardwareInterface::initNodes - Start Conveyor Interface Node");
191  ros::NodeHandle nh_conveyor(nh, "conveyor");
192  _conveyor_interface = std::make_shared<conveyor_interface::ConveyorInterfaceCore>(nh_conveyor, _ttl_interface, _can_interface);
193  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
194 }
195 
200 void HardwareInterface::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
201 {
202  _motors_report_service = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/launch_motors_report", &HardwareInterface::_callbackLaunchMotorsReport, this);
203 
204  _stop_motors_report_service = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/stop_motors_report", &HardwareInterface::_callbackStopMotorsReport, this);
205 
206  _reboot_motors_service = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/reboot_motors", &HardwareInterface::_callbackRebootMotors, this);
207 }
208 
212 void HardwareInterface::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
213 {
214  _hw_status_publisher = nh.advertise<niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus>("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_status", 10);
215 
216  _hw_status_publisher_timer = nh.createTimer(_hw_status_publisher_duration, &HardwareInterface::_publishHardwareStatus, this);
217 
218  _sw_version_publisher = nh.advertise<niryo_robot_msgs::SoftwareVersion>("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/software_version", 10);
219 
220  _sw_version_publisher_timer = nh.createTimer(_sw_version_publisher_duration, &HardwareInterface::_publishSoftwareVersion, this);
221 
222  // Cancel goals publisher used if an emergency stop is detected
223  _cancel_goal_publishers.clear();
224  for (auto& cancel_topic_name : ACTION_CANCEL_TOPICS)
225  {
226  _cancel_goal_publishers.push_back(nh.advertise<actionlib_msgs::GoalID>(cancel_topic_name, 10));
227  }
228 }
229 
234 void HardwareInterface::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle & nh) {
235  _robot_status_subscriber = nh.subscribe("/niryo_robot_status/robot_status", 10, &HardwareInterface::_callbackRobotStatus, this);
236 }
237 
238 // ********************
239 // Callbacks
240 // ********************
241 
242 void HardwareInterface::_callbackRobotStatus(const niryo_robot_status::RobotStatus::ConstPtr& msg) {
243  if (msg->robot_status == niryo_robot_status::RobotStatus::ESTOP) {
244  // Cancel all action goals
245  for (auto &pub : _cancel_goal_publishers) {
246  pub.publish(actionlib_msgs::GoalID());
247  }
248 
249  // Pause hardware status reading and control loop
250  _joints_interface->setEstopFlag(true);
251  _ttl_interface->setEstopFlag(true);
252  }
253 
254  // Handle emergency stop
255  if ((msg->robot_status != niryo_robot_status::RobotStatus::ESTOP)
256  && (_previous_robot_status == niryo_robot_status::RobotStatus::ESTOP)
257  && _hardware_state != niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::REBOOT) {
258  _ttl_interface->setEstopFlag(false);
259  _joints_interface->setEstopFlag(false);
260 
261  int32_t status;
262  std::string message;
263  int ret = rebootMotors(status, message);
264 
265  if (!ret)
266  {
267  ROS_INFO("Hardware Interface - Reboot motors done");
268  }
269  else
270  {
271  ROS_ERROR("Hardware Interface - Reboot motors Problems: %s", message.c_str());
272  }
273  }
274 
275  _previous_robot_status = msg->robot_status;
276 }
277 
284 bool HardwareInterface::_callbackStopMotorsReport(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request & /*req*/, niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response &res)
285 {
286  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
287  _hardware_state = niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::DEBUG;
288 
289  ROS_INFO("Hardware Interface - Stop Motor Report");
290 
291  if (_can_interface)
292  _can_interface->activeDebugMode(false);
293 
294  if (_ttl_interface)
295  _ttl_interface->activeDebugMode(false);
296 
297  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
298  res.message = "";
299 
300  _hardware_state = niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::NORMAL;
301  return true;
302 }
303 
310 bool HardwareInterface::_callbackLaunchMotorsReport(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request & /*req*/, niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response &res)
311 {
312  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
313  _hardware_state = niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::DEBUG;
314 
315  ROS_INFO("Hardware Interface - Start Motors Report");
316 
317  int can_status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
318  int ttl_status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
319 
320  if (_ttl_interface)
321  {
322  _ttl_interface->activeDebugMode(true);
323  ttl_status = _ttl_interface->launchMotorsReport();
324  _ttl_interface->activeDebugMode(false);
325  }
326 
327  if (_can_interface)
328  {
329  _can_interface->activeDebugMode(true);
330  can_status = _can_interface->launchMotorsReport();
331  _can_interface->activeDebugMode(false);
332  ROS_WARN("Hardware Interface - Motors report ended");
333 
334  if ((niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == can_status) && (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == ttl_status))
335  {
336  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
337  res.message = "Hardware interface seems working properly";
338  ROS_INFO("Hardware Interface - Motors report ended");
339  return true;
340  }
341  }
342  else
343  {
344  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == ttl_status)
345  {
346  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
347  res.message = "Hardware interface seems working properly";
348  ROS_INFO("Hardware Interface - Motors report ended");
349  return true;
350  }
351  }
352 
353  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
354  res.message = "Steppers status: ";
355  res.message += (can_status == niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS) ? "Ok" : "Error";
356  res.message += ", Dxl status: ";
357  res.message += (ttl_status == niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS) ? "Ok" : "Error";
358 
359  ROS_INFO("Hardware Interface - Motors report ended");
360  _hardware_state = niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::NORMAL;
361 
362  return true;
363 }
364 
371 bool HardwareInterface::_callbackRebootMotors(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request & /*req*/, niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response &res)
372 {
373  rebootMotors(res.status, res.message);
374  // no reboot for can interface for now
375 
376  return true;
377 }
378 
379 
386 int HardwareInterface::rebootMotors(int32_t &status, std::string &message)
387 {
388  status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
389  _hardware_state = niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::REBOOT;
390 
391  // for each interface, call for reboot
392  int ret = 0;
393  bool torque_on = ("ned2" == _hardware_version || "ned3pro" == _hardware_version);
394 
395  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version || "ned3pro" == _hardware_version)
396  ros::Duration(3).sleep();
397 
398  if (_joints_interface && !_joints_interface->rebootAll(torque_on))
399  {
400  ret++;
401  message += "Joints Interface, ";
402  }
403  if (_tools_interface && !_tools_interface->rebootHardware(torque_on))
404  {
405  ret++;
406  message += "Tools Interface, ";
407  }
408 
409  if (_end_effector_interface && !_end_effector_interface->rebootHardware())
410  {
411  ret++;
412  message += "End Effector Panel Interface, ";
413  }
414 
415  if (!ret)
416  {
417  status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
418  message = "Reboot motors done";
419  }
420  else
421  {
422  message = "Reboot motors Problems: " + message;
423  }
424 
425  _hardware_state = niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus::NORMAL;
426 
427  return ret;
428 }
429 
434 void HardwareInterface::_publishHardwareStatus(const ros::TimerEvent &)
435 {
436  niryo_robot_msgs::BusState ttl_bus_state;
437  niryo_robot_msgs::BusState can_bus_state;
438 
439  bool need_calibration = false;
440  bool calibration_in_progress = false;
441 
442  int cpu_temperature = 0;
443 
444  niryo_robot_msgs::HardwareStatus msg;
445  msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
446  msg.connection_up = true;
447 
448  std::vector<std::string> motor_names;
449  std::vector<int32_t> temperatures;
450  std::vector<double> voltages;
451  std::vector<std::string> motor_types;
452 
453  std::vector<int32_t> hw_errors;
454  std::vector<std::string> hw_errors_msg;
455 
456  if (_can_interface)
457  {
458  can_bus_state = _can_interface->getBusState();
459  msg.connection_up = msg.connection_up && can_bus_state.connection_status;
460  }
461 
462  if (_ttl_interface)
463  {
464  ttl_bus_state = _ttl_interface->getBusState();
465  msg.connection_up = msg.connection_up && ttl_bus_state.connection_status;
466  }
467 
468  if (_joints_interface)
469  {
470  need_calibration = _joints_interface->needCalibration();
471  calibration_in_progress = _joints_interface->isCalibrationInProgress();
472 
473  auto joints_states = _joints_interface->getJointsState();
474  for (const auto &jState : joints_states)
475  {
476  motor_names.emplace_back(jState->getName());
477  voltages.emplace_back(jState->getVoltage());
478  temperatures.emplace_back(jState->getTemperature());
479  hw_errors.emplace_back(jState->getHardwareError());
480  hw_errors_msg.emplace_back(jState->getHardwareErrorMessage());
481  motor_types.emplace_back(common::model::HardwareTypeEnum(jState->getHardwareType()).toString());
482  }
483  }
484 
485  if (_end_effector_interface)
486  {
487  auto ee_state = _end_effector_interface->getEndEffectorState();
488  if (ee_state && ee_state->isValid())
489  {
490  motor_names.emplace_back("End Effector");
491  voltages.emplace_back(ee_state->getVoltage());
492  temperatures.emplace_back(ee_state->getTemperature());
493  hw_errors.emplace_back(ee_state->getHardwareError());
494  hw_errors_msg.emplace_back(ee_state->getHardwareErrorMessage());
495  motor_types.emplace_back(common::model::HardwareTypeEnum(ee_state->getHardwareType()).toString());
496  }
497  }
498 
499  if (_tools_interface)
500  {
501  auto tool_state = _tools_interface->getToolState();
502  if (tool_state && tool_state->isValid())
503  {
504  motor_names.emplace_back("Tool");
505  voltages.emplace_back(tool_state->getVoltage());
506  temperatures.emplace_back(tool_state->getTemperature());
507  hw_errors.emplace_back(tool_state->getHardwareError());
508  hw_errors_msg.emplace_back(tool_state->getHardwareErrorMessage());
509  motor_types.emplace_back(common::model::HardwareTypeEnum(tool_state->getHardwareType()).toString());
510  }
511  }
512 
513  if (_conveyor_interface)
514  {
515  auto conveyor_states = _conveyor_interface->getConveyorStates();
516  for (const auto &cState : conveyor_states)
517  {
518  if (cState && cState->isValid())
519  {
520  motor_names.emplace_back("Conveyor_" + std::to_string(cState->getId()));
521  voltages.emplace_back(cState->getVoltage());
522  temperatures.emplace_back(cState->getTemperature());
523  hw_errors.emplace_back(cState->getHardwareError());
524  hw_errors_msg.emplace_back(cState->getHardwareErrorMessage());
525  motor_types.emplace_back(common::model::HardwareTypeEnum(cState->getHardwareType()).toString());
526  }
527  }
528  }
529 
530  cpu_temperature = _cpu_interface->getCpuTemperature();
531 
532  msg.rpi_temperature = cpu_temperature;
533  msg.hardware_version = _hardware_version;
534 
535  std::string error_message = can_bus_state.error;
536  if (!ttl_bus_state.error.empty())
537  {
538  error_message += "\n";
539  error_message += ttl_bus_state.error;
540  }
541 
542  msg.error_message = error_message;
543  msg.hardware_state = _hardware_state;
544 
545  msg.calibration_needed = need_calibration;
546  msg.calibration_in_progress = calibration_in_progress;
547 
548  msg.motor_names = motor_names;
549  msg.motor_types = motor_types;
550 
551  msg.temperatures = temperatures;
552  msg.voltages = voltages;
553  msg.hardware_errors = hw_errors;
554  msg.hardware_errors_message = hw_errors_msg;
555 
556  _hw_status_publisher.publish(msg);
557 }
558 
563 void HardwareInterface::_publishSoftwareVersion(const ros::TimerEvent &)
564 {
565  std::vector<std::string> motor_names;
566  std::vector<std::string> firmware_versions;
567 
568  if (_joints_interface)
569  {
570  auto joints_states = _joints_interface->getJointsState();
571  for (const auto &jState : joints_states)
572  {
573  motor_names.emplace_back(jState->getName());
574  firmware_versions.emplace_back(jState->getFirmwareVersion());
575  }
576  }
577 
578  if (_end_effector_interface)
579  {
580  auto ee_state = _end_effector_interface->getEndEffectorState();
581  if (ee_state && ee_state->isValid())
582  {
583  motor_names.emplace_back("End Effector");
584  firmware_versions.emplace_back(ee_state->getFirmwareVersion());
585  }
586  }
587 
588  if (_tools_interface)
589  {
590  auto tool_state = _tools_interface->getToolState();
591  if (tool_state && tool_state->isValid())
592  {
593  motor_names.emplace_back("Tool");
594  firmware_versions.emplace_back(tool_state->getFirmwareVersion());
595  }
596  }
597 
598  if (_conveyor_interface)
599  {
600  auto conveyor_states = _conveyor_interface->getConveyorStates();
601  for (const auto &cState : conveyor_states)
602  {
603  if (cState && cState->isValid())
604  {
605  motor_names.emplace_back("Conveyor");
606  firmware_versions.emplace_back(cState->getFirmwareVersion());
607  }
608  }
609  }
610 
611  niryo_robot_msgs::SoftwareVersion msg;
612  msg.motor_names = motor_names;
613  msg.stepper_firmware_versions = firmware_versions;
614  msg.rpi_image_version = _rpi_image_version;
615  msg.ros_niryo_robot_version = _ros_niryo_robot_version;
616  msg.robot_version = _hardware_version;
617 
618  _sw_version_publisher.publish(msg);
619 }
620
